articles.title: German government starts 2020 with new strife over Cabinet
articles.description: German Chancellor Angela Merkel's governing coalition is starting the new year with a new bout of strife, this time over a conservative ally's call for new faces in the Cabinet
articles.content: The call was unexpected and apparently unwelcome to his allies. Merkels spokesman, Steffen Seibert, said Monday that the chancellor works well and gladly with all of her ministers though he did concede that the government could increase the speed or dynamism … [+1016 chars]
